thread.section_title: Leibish & Co. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Leibish & Co. | leibish.com
thread.title: Brokenheartsurgeon

author: Brokenheartsurgeon
title: Brokenheartsurgeon
text: I recently purchased a pair of yellow diamond earrings from Leibish and Co. and was frankly amazed at both the quality of the stones (which did not surprise me - they are well recognized as the best source for coloured diamonds world wide) but even more so by the outstanding level of service provided. To ensure that the final product I chose was exactly what I wanted both the Tel Aviv and New York offices coordinated to send individual stones and finished products to New York during the short time I was available there. The actual buying experience was extremely pleasant and the certification and packaging puts many 5th Avenue jewelers to shame. I genuinely cannot recommend them highly enough and will be purchasing all of my future larger gemstones from them.
